text.0: with stones have we pressed out o come these gladdening drops are blent with milk these somadrops which gladden you.
text.1: come to us kings who reach to heaven approach us coming hitherward.
text.2: these milky drops are yours mitra and varuṇa bright soma juices blent with milk.
text.3: here are the droppings come ye nigh the somadroppings blent with curd juices expressed and blent with curd.
text.4: now for the wakening of your dawn together with the sungods rays.
text.5: juice waits for mitra and for varuṇa to drink fair juice for drink for sacrifice.
text.6: as twere a radiantcoloured cow they milk with stones the stalk for you with stones they milk the somaplant.
text.7: may ye come nigh us may ye turn hither to drink the soma juice.
text.8: the men pressed out this juice mitra and varuṇa pressed out this soma for your drink.
